title: WTT: My T205 Tinker for your T205/T206 Sovereign

posts.post_title: WTT: My T205 Tinker for your T205/T206 Sovereign
posts.post_content:
Anybody interested in a Tinker in rough shape?  I'm looking for T205 or T206 Sovereigns to fill the holes on my list.  Let me know...thanks!

Take Care,
Geno
